Description_lang: A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by $s1%$?a452494[ and all magic damage you take by an additional $s3%][]$?a137048[][ and all damage you deal by $s2%]. Lasts until canceled.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken reduced by $s1%.$?a452494[Magic damage taken reduced by an additional $s3%.][]$?a137048[][Damage done reduced by $s2%.]

description_blz.en_US:
A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
description_blz.es_MX:
Un estado de combate defensivo que reduce un 15% todo el daño que recibes y un 10% todo el daño que infliges. 

Dura hasta que se cancela.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Postura de combate defensiva que reduz todo o dano recebido em 15% e todo o dano causado em 10%. 

Dura até o cancelamento.
description_blz.de_DE:
Eine defensive Kampfhaltung, die sämtlichen von Euch erlittenen Schaden um 15% und sämtlichen von Euch verursachten Schaden um 10% verringert.

Hält bis zum Abbruch an.
description_blz.en_GB:
A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
description_blz.es_ES:
Una posición de combate defensiva que reduce un 15% todo el daño que recibes y un 10% todo el daño que infliges. 

Dura hasta que se cancela.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Une posture de combat défensive qui réduit les dégâts subis de 15 %, et les dégâts infligés de 10 %. 

Dure jusqu’à annulation.
description_blz.it_IT:
Una postura da combattimento difensiva che riduce tutti i danni subiti del 15% e tutti i danni inflitti del 10%.

Dura fino all'annullamento.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Защитная боевая стойка, уменьшающая получаемый урон на 15%. Также уменьшает наносимый вами урон на 10%. 

Действует до отмены.
description_blz.ko_KR:
방어적인 전투 태세를 갖춰 받는 모든 피해가 15%만큼 감소합니다. 모든 공격력이 10%만큼 증가합니다. 

취소할 때까지 지속됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
一種防禦性的戰鬥狀態，你受到的所有傷害降低15%，造成的所有傷害降低10%。

此效果將持續到取消為止。
description_blz.zh_CN:
防御性的姿态，使你受到的所有伤害降低15%，造成的伤害降低10%。

效果一直持续直到主动取消。
